nodes.text: The Cemas were a species of sentient beings. They had feet. At least one member of the species had entered the galactic community by 17 ABY. That year, the smuggler Han Solo helped a Cemas to its feet in the Crystal Jewel casino, on the planet Coruscant, after a bomb went off in the New Republic Senate Hall nearby.
An unnamed Cemas appears in the novel The New Rebellion, written by Kristine Kathryn Rusch and published by Bantam Spectra in 1996.
